document_data.name: Narur al-Khawati
document_data.mainbody: '''Narur al-Khawati''' was a waterfinder for the [[desert centaur]]s of the [[Khawati Clan]] in the [[Burning Lands]] near [[Moradask]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: The Khawati Clan's leader, and Narur's sister, deferred to her judgement in important decisions.
document_data.History: She rescued her sister from the clutches of the [[Shorn]], a devious cult active in the region. Her auguries warned of danger to the clan if they pursued a vendetta against the Shorn, but the clan's leader ignored the threats in pursuit of vengeance.
document_data.Relationships: Narur was the older sister of the clan's leader [[Tebessa al-Khawati]].
